title: Terminator Genisys: Revolution v3.0.0 (Mod money) data + mod
description:
Terminator Genisys: Revolution v3.0.0 (Mod money)

The year is 2028 and humanity is on the brink of extinction. Help John Connor in the war to save the human race in the official game of the new movie Terminator Genisys. Escape from the Skynet prison camp and fight the machines in this action-packed sci-fi shooter!

EXPLOSIVE THIRD-PERSON SHOOTER
Hundreds of missions to choose from! Battle your way through stunningly rendered, post apocalyptic locations. Use your tactical prowess against a wide range of deadly enemies. Easy to use, responsive mobile controls

ADVANCED CUSTOMIZABLE WEAPONRY
Amass a wide variety of present day and futuristic weapons. Switch between Shotguns, Assault Rifles, and Sniper Rifles and take control of the battlefield
Level up your weapons with High Explosives, Depleted Uranium, Plasma, and 
Electrical munitions. Use Rockets, Grenades, and EMPs against the enemy

RISE THROUGH THE RANKS
Join the Resistance and get promoted to higher ranks. Fight alongside key Resistance members from the film. Immersive storyline written by world renowned sci-fi writer Dan Abnett. High-end, immersive tablet gameplay!

Whatâ€™s new:
â€¢ Buy the all new Guardian Pack to play as the Terminator: Arnold Schwarzenegger himself!
â€¢ Immerse yourself with new voice acting from Arnold Schwarzenegger!
â€¢ Wield iconic Terminator heavy weapons: Minigun, Rocket Launcher, and the Classic Shotgun
â€¢ Try playing as the legendary Terminator in new exciting missions!
â€¢ Build up your Resistance Base and defend against Skynet invasions!
â€¢ Equip new gear! 6 new helmets and 3 new armors just added!
â€¢ Take on the new LAX region in the Campaign!

This app has Google Mobile Ads advertisements
Install APK,Place data folder in SDCard/Android/Obb/ and play.
Requirements: Android 3.0+
